data.eml:eml: Serromyia diabolica, a new biting midge species from Lebanon (Diptera: Ceratopogonidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dominiak, Patrycja, Mathieu, Bruno (2015): Serromyia diabolica, a new biting midge species from Lebanon (Diptera: Ceratopogonidae). Zootaxa 3946 (3): 436-444, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3946.3.10
